Articles.Content: All kinds would be great!! You can set two points!

Oh god, another planet suggestion thread.

Please, use the 'search' function in the top right corner.

Please, use the 'search' function in the top right corner.

To find what? I wanted to now what the poeple here want for the next time!

>What kind of planets do you want?

>You may only select up to 2 options.

No thanks.

Your first post could definitely have been phrased better (What planets do you think should be implemented in KSP? for instance) although it would still be prudent to use the search function to locate threads asking similar questions to yours. At any rate, having the option of picking up to two out of the five rather poorly enunciated options, I choose not to vote. Ideally I would like to see a broad variety of worlds to explore, from barren to lush, flat to mountainous, arctic to searing, etc.

This is a poll, rather than a suggestion to the Devs, and planets are coming don\'t you worry.

This thread would be much better off in General Discussion to be honest.
[gmod]Duplicate thread, please use the search function.[/gmod]
